scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,api,admin -c cyan,magenta,green "npm run -w @unykorn/web dev" "npm run -w @unykorn/api dev" "npm run -w @unykorn/admin dev"
scripts.dev:reset: bash -lc 'pids="$(lsof -t -i:3000 -sTCP:LISTEN || true)"; [ -n "$pids" ] && kill -9 $pids || true; pids="$(lsof -t -i:3001 -sTCP:LISTEN || true)"; [ -n "$pids" ] && kill -9 $pids || true; pids="$(lsof -t -i:4000 -sTCP:LISTEN || true)"; [ -n "$pids" ] && kill -9 $pids || true'
scripts.api:stop: bash -lc 'pids="$(lsof -t -i:4000 -sTCP:LISTEN || true)"; [ -n "$pids" ] && kill -9 $pids || true; pkill -f "nodemon src/index\.js" || true; pkill -f "node .*apps/api/src/index\.js" || true; sleep 0.3'
scripts.api:reset: bash -lc 'npm run api:stop; for i in {1..10}; do lsof -i:4000 -sTCP:LISTEN -n -P >/dev/null 2>&1 || break; sleep 0.2; done; npm run api:start'
scripts.build: npm run -w @unykorn/web build && npm run -w @unykorn/api build && npm run -w @unykorn/admin build
scripts.start: concurrently -n web,api,admin -c cyan,magenta,green "npm run -w @unykorn/web start" "npm run -w @unykorn/api start" "npm run -w @unykorn/admin start"
